messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Kip Winger? (was scaring the newbies)
messages.msgSnippet: Sorry, but who is/was Kip Winger?  ~ Alicia ... [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
messages.messageBody:
Sorry, but who is/was Kip Winger? ~ Alicia

audrey elwood wrote:

> i thought someone might ask.we met in a ballet class in denver in 1980. i
> was 18 he was 20. moved to new york tog.we lived tog for three years
> before
> he dumped me.
> audrey
>
>
> >From: "Heaven L" <takemehigher_44035@...>
> >Reply-To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
> >To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
> >Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] scaring the newbies
> >Date: Tue, 06 Aug 2002 13:48:26 -0400
> >
> >audrey,
> >
> >Your ex-boyfriend was kip winger?
> >
> >Tina
> >
> >
> > >From: "audrey elwood" <audreyelwood@...>
> > >Reply-To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
> > >To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
> > >Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] scaring the newbies
> > >Date: Tue, 06 Aug 2002 16:53:28 +0000
> > >
> > >absolutely!that's actually an old lyric from an ex- boyfriends(none
> other
> > >than kip winger)song that came to mind.but io do find that every
> new bit
> >of
> > >knowledge opens a vast new world, therefore, my awareness of how
> little i
> > >actually know...it's a humbling experience.
> > >audrey
> > >
> > >
> > > >From: Dnowens@...
> > > >Reply-To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com

> > > > > audrey
> > > > >

> > > >~Nancy
